comments.body: What's higher tho? Only rv right

Wdym higher clgs? It's only rv that's better than pes rr
Only cs,is right not cse specs

Depends on the goal, the cse degree is still better than the spec for masters/psu but if u are considering a job then it doesn't matter, so id say cse spec in rv is still better than pes rr considering the intake of pesu..
But still cse spec won't have stats as good as rv cs,is ig

The avg of rvce cse spec will be equal or slightly better than pes rr cse, so again it depends, cse degree is better than a cse spec and pes has a better infra than rv.. The only downside is intake id say
One last question, how will cse spec affect options for masters
You should ask some senior for this, I basically have no idea abt this because I won't be doing masters
